description: External alterations to all elevations; alterations to north facing boundary treatment, forecourt and vehicle entrance points, two storey extension to east elevations and north elevations
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 15052GA-20-104D Ground Floor Plan, 15052GA-20-106D Second Floor Plan, 15052GA-20-108A Roof Plan, 15052GA-20-109C Elevations 1/2, 15052GA-20-110C Elevations 2/2, 15052GA-20-111C Section A-A, 15052GA-20-112C Section B-B, 15052GA-20-113D Section C-C, 15052GA-20-114B Pier Set Out Details, 15052GA-20-115B External Fabric Specifications, 15052GA-20-117 Lighthouse Works, 15052GA-20-118C Proposed Floor Extension and 15052GA-PC External Material Finishes  REASON: 	For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be those as described in the submitted application documents.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h)(j), 1.2 (f), 3.1 and 3.8, and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015). | Deliveries of goods to and waste collections from the proposed development shall be restricted to the front of the building and only take place during the period 0800 - 1800 hrs, Mondays to Saturdays and at no time on Sundays and Public Holidays.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with policies 7A, 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 3.1 and 3.8, and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015).
